NetAlertX.description:
NetAlertX is an intrusion detection system (IDS). Easily visualize all your networks in one place, enhance security with real-time alerts, and enjoy seamless integration with your smart home.

Note: this container uses the `net=host` option to enable local scanning.

Based on the official OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
